mapper.select: select count(*) from ope_purchase_order purchase left join ope_sys_staff staff1 on staff1.id = purchase.created_by left join ope_sys_staff staff2 on staff2.id = purchase.consignee_user left join ope_supplier supp on supp.id = purchase.factory_id where purchase.dr = 0 and purchase.purchase_type = #{enter.classType}

sql.if: and purchase.purchase_no like concat('%', #{enter.keyword}, '%') or staff2.full_name like concat('%', #{enter.keyword}, '%') or supp.supplier_name like concat('%', #{enter.keyword}, '%')

mapper.select:
select purchase.id, purchase.purchase_no, purchase.purchase_status, purchase.purchase_qty, purchase.purchase_amount, purchase.delivery_date, purchase.factory_id, supp.supplier_name as factoryName, purchase.consignee_user, staff2.full_name as consigneeUserName, purchase.created_by, purchase.created_time, staff1.full_name as createdByName from ope_purchase_order purchase left join ope_sys_staff staff1 on staff1.id = purchase.created_by left join ope_sys_staff staff2 on staff2.id = purchase.consignee_user left join ope_supplier supp on supp.id = purchase.factory_id where purchase.dr = 0 and purchase.purchase_type = #{enter.classType}
order by purchase.created_time desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}

select purchase.id, purchase.purchase_no, purchase.purchase_status, purchase.trans_type, purchase.allocate_id, purchase.allocate_no, purchase.factory_id, supp.supplier_name as factoryName, purchase.delivery_date, purchase.contact_user, purchase.contact_user_name, purchase.contact_country_code, purchase.contact_telephone, purchase.contact_mail, purchase.notify_user, purchase.notify_user_name, purchase.notify_country_code, purchase.notify_user_telephone, purchase.notify_user_mail, purchase.remark, purchase.consignee_user, staff2.full_name as consigneeUserName, purchase.consignee_country_code, purchase.consignee_user_telephone, purchase.consignee_user_mail, purchase.consignee_address, purchase.consignee_post_code, purchase.consignor_user, staff1.full_name as consignorUserName, purchase.consignor_country_code, purchase.consignor_telephone, purchase.consignor_mail, purchase.payment_type, purchase.planned_payment_time, purchase.payment_day, purchase.purchase_contract, purchase.purchase_type, purchase.purchase_origin_type from ope_purchase_order purchase left join ope_sys_staff staff1 on staff1.id = purchase.consignor_user left join ope_sys_staff staff2 on staff2.id = purchase.consignee_user left join ope_supplier supp on supp.id = purchase.factory_id where purchase.dr = 0 and purchase.id = #{id}

SELECT scooter.id AS id, scooter.group_id AS groupId, scooter.color_id AS colorId, scooter.qty AS qty, scooter.unit_price, group1.group_name AS groupName, color.color_value AS colorValue, color.color_name AS colorName FROM ope_purchase_scooter_b scooter LEFT JOIN ope_specificat_group group1 ON group1.id = scooter.group_id LEFT JOIN ope_color color ON color.id = scooter.color_id where scooter.purchase_id = #{id} and scooter.dr = 0

select combin.id, combin.combin_name, combin.production_combin_bom_id, combin.qty, combin.unit_price, bom.bom_no from ope_purchase_combin_b combin left join ope_production_combin_bom bom on bom.id = combin.production_combin_bom_id where combin.dr = 0 and combin.purchase_id = #{id}
select parts.id, parts.parts_id, parts.parts_name, parts.parts_no, parts.parts_type, parts.qty, parts.unit_price from ope_purchase_parts_b parts where parts.dr = 0 and parts.purchase_id = #{id}

select allocate.id as allocateId, allocate.allocate_no, allocate.consignee_user, staff.full_name as consigneeUserName, allocate.consignee_country_code, allocate.consignee_user_telephone, allocate.consignee_user_mail, allocate.consignee_post_code, allocate.consignee_address from ope_allocate_order allocate left join ope_sys_staff staff on staff.id = allocate.consignee_user where allocate.dr = 0 and allocate.allocate_status not in (0,70) and allocate.allocate_type = #{enter.classType}
and allocate.allocate_no like concat('%', #{enter.keyword}, '%')

select id, purchase_no, purchase_status, purchase_qty, purchase_type, delivery_date from ope_purchase_order where dr = 0 and delivery_date like concat('%', #{enter.deliveryDate}, '%') and purchase_status != 70

select trace.id, trace.relation_id, trace.op_type, trace.remark, trace.created_time, staff.full_name as createdByName from ope_op_trace trace left join ope_sys_staff staff on trace.created_by = staff.id where trace.dr = 0 and trace.relation_id = #{id} and order_type = 2 order by trace.created_time desc

select count(*) from ope_out_whouse_order wh left join ope_invoice_order invoice on invoice.id = wh.invoice_id left join ope_purchase_order purchase on purchase.id = invoice.purchase_id where wh.dr = 0 and purchase.id = #{purchaseId} and wh.out_wh_status in (10,20)
